text: You find yourself at a crossroads, and unfortunately, you made the wrong choice.
You enter a dark tunnel, desperately needing a flashlight. Fear creeps in as the darkness surrounds you. Suddenly, you spot a door. What will you do?
Upon entering, you find a mysterious paper on the floor. It simply says, "Proceed."
Choosing to stay still, you hear a strange noise behind you. What will you do?
The door opens, revealing a room filled with glowing crystals. Three paths lie ahead. Which one will you choose?
As you investigate the noise, a hidden passage is revealed. Will you explore it?
Staying still, the noise fades away, and you're left alone in the dark tunnel. What's your next move?
The left path leads you to a magical garden with talking flowers. They offer you a magical potion. Will you drink it?
The middle path takes you to a room filled with mirrors. One mirror shows a reflection of a different world. What will you do?
The right path leads to a treasure room with piles of gold and jewels. However, a dragon guards the treasure. What's your plan?

buttons.text: Try to sneak past the dragon

text: Exploring the hidden passage reveals a secret room with a mysterious artifact. What will you do with the artifact?
Ignoring the hidden passage, you continue forward. The tunnel leads to a dead-end. What will you do now?
Continuing forward, you encounter a mysterious figure offering a choice between two magical items. Which one will you choose?
Turning back, you find the tunnel has changed. It now leads to a different part of the dark maze. What will you do?

buttons.text: Attempt to find your way back

text: Drinking the potion grants you the ability to communicate with animals. A helpful bird guides you to the exit. You've successfully escaped the dark maze!
You decline the potion and continue your journey. The path leads to a mysterious portal. Will you enter the portal?
Stepping through the mirror transports you to a parallel world. The rules here are different. What will you do in this strange new world?

buttons.text: Seek a way back to your world

text: Choosing to stay in the room, you discover a hidden passage behind one of the mirrors. Where does the passage lead?
Your choices have led you to a critical moment. What will you do to overcome the challenges that lie ahead?

buttons.text: Find a way to outsmart the challenges

text: The final room presents the ultimate challenge. Your journey has prepared you for this moment. Face it with courage and determination!

Congratulations! You've successfully navigated through the dark maze, faced numerous challenges, and emerged victorious. Your adventure comes to an end, but who knows what awaits you in the next story...
